rows.name: Hide and Seek

The kids in Bower Lounge have got you
playing hide-and-seek. Find the three
of them somewhere in Avaritia.

You found all the hidden children. The
kids seem satisfied for now, but what
game will they come up with next?
Find Aft in Avaritia.
Find Kagege in Avaritia.
Find Talulu in Avaritia.

Report to Aft in Bower Lounge
in Avaritia.
Knocked About Nopon

You've come across a Nopon trader
being attacked on the Garanti Plain.
Defeat the monsters and help her out!

Tunini was heading to Torigo with an
Armu laden with Gulan makeup that
is sure to be a big hit in the shops!

Defeat the Snooz Volff on
Garanti Plain in Gula.

Speak with Tunini on
Garanti Plain in Gula.
A Young Man's Prize

A young Superbian man named Luchini
is after a Snow-White Rhino native to
parts of Gula. Catch one for him.

Luchini is delighted to have acquired a
Snow-White Rhino before his rival Leif.
This will only raise his mother's hopes...

Capture a Snow-White Rhino close
by Seigle Fell in Gula.

Bring the Snow-White Rhino to Luchini
in Grodd Residential Zone in Gula.

Talk to Luchini near Garagorm's Arch
in Gula.
Mysterious Note

The note you found in Acid Gullet is a
map of sorts with a spot marked on it.
Why not go and see what you find?

The knife's owner was a treasure hunter
named Erebos. He apologized for the
misunderstanding and went on his way.

Go to the location marked
on the map in Invidia.

Search for the owner of
the broken knife in Invidia.

Defeat Erebos in Bluestep Ditch
in Invidia.

Talk to Erebos in Bluestep Ditch
in Invidia.
Gotta Start Somewhere!

On the way to Fons Maim, you found
a group of mercenaries in a spot of
trouble. See what you can do to help.

The rescued Nopon trader lost his
merchandise, but the experience made
Ragi's mercenaries stronger.

Defeat the Maasti Ignas at
Farlaine Central Pools in Invidia.

Speak with Lizzy at
Farlaine Central Pools in Invidia.

Find Doruru somewhere around
Badfella's Cave Fort in Invidia.

Defeat the Rood Ignas near
Badfella's Cave Fort in Invidia.

Speak with Doruru around
Badfella's Cave Fort in Invidia.

Report to Lizzy at
Farlaine Central Pools in Invidia.
Would-Be Mercs

Some Hræsvelgr kids who went hunting
for materials still haven't come home.
Look for them at the Greatmaw Rapids.

You brought the children safely back to
Hræsvelgr. It looks like Jillwood is hoping to
grow strong and avenge his parents...

Head to the Greatmaw Rapids
in Invidia.

Defeat the Naola Crustips at the
Greatmaw Rapids in Invidia.

Talk to Jillwood at the
Greatmaw Rapids in Invidia.
Talk to Gorsa at Hræsvelgr in Invidia.
特注のアクセサリー

鍛冶屋の○○○○がレックス達に
強力な装飾品を作ってくれるらしい
素材を集めて持っていこう

○○○○からアクセサリーを受け取った
早速装備してみよう
ベースとなるアクセサリーを用意しよう
ピオーネストーンを5つ集めよう
ゴゴールからゴリラの剛毛を10個集めよう

アイテムをすべて集め終わった
村に戻って鍛冶屋に渡そう
海トカゲの鱗(仮)を3つ集めよう
海鳥の羽根(仮)を4つ集めよう

追加の素材を集め終わった
再び集めたアイテムを鍛冶屋に渡そう！
True Colors

Deborah, an artist working in Fons Maim, has requested that you find her
ingredients for her paint.

You gave Deborah the materials she
needed. Now nothing's stopping her
from taking the art world by storm!
Source some Crustip Chitin in Invidia.
Source some Tricolor Rock in Invidia.

Speak to Deborah in the Commercial
District in Invidia.
シェフの特製料理

フォンス・マイムのレストランの
オーナーから,食材を食い荒らす害獣が
居ると相談された。被害を減らす為
害獣を退治しよう。

"無事料理を届ける事が出来た
見た目はゲテモノにしかみえなかったが
おいしいのだろうか…"

水田の作物を荒らすモンスターを
討伐しよう

作物の安全が確保できた
依頼人に報告しよう
巨大カエルの肉(仮)を手に入れよう
ジメジメシメジを採集しよう
集めた食材を依頼人に届けよう

出来上がった怪しい料理を
宿舎に居る兵士届けよう

兵士は満足してくれたようだ
依頼人に報告しよう
Road to the Capital

A merchant on his way to the capital
Alba Margen has asked you to
eliminate some monsters on the road.

Now that he's sure the road to Alba
Cavanich is safe, Pididi is making his
way to the capital with his wares.

Defeat the Land Volff and Noog
Skeeters in the Cargo Transportation
Zone in Superbia.

Report back to Pididi at Port
Anangham in Superbia.
Stolen Keepsake

You met an old man whose precious
memento was stolen while he was going
for a stroll. Get it back for him!

Dogurado has got his keepsake back.
It'll keep the memories of his beloved
dog Sally alive for many more years.

Look for clues around the site of the
Village Guardian in Liberalitas.

Defeat the Gegl Quadwing at
Godsford Isle in Liberalitas.

Talk to Dogurado near the
Village Guardian in Liberalitas.
村の水源

村の水源に異常が起きているらしい。
雲海の中の方で何かが起きていないか
調べてほしいと頼まれた。

水源の異常原因を取り除き、
修理用アイテムを集めて○○○に渡した
あとは○○○に任せよう

サルベージして水源を止めている
原因を調べよう
依頼人に報告しよう

サルベージして他にもいる神獣寄生中を
討伐しよう

サルベージして残りの神獣寄生中を
討伐しよう
依頼人に討伐した事を報告しに行こう
ライコー岩を４個集めよう
依頼人に全て集まった事を報告しよう
Mellica the Chorister

A member of the Choir of Acedia named
Mellica thinks someone is watching her.
Help her identify her observer.

Mellica and Albina were able to talk
things out. The day may yet come when
they sing together in the choir!

Talk to the townspeople in
Acedia's Seoris Plaza.

Report to Mellica in Seoris Plaza,
in Acedia.

Go and talk to Albina in Seoris Plaza,
in Acedia.

Defeat the hired Driver attacking you
at Seoris Plaza, Acedia.
Acedia's Teachings

Would-be reporter Moruru has asked
you to help gather information on the
warrior monks in the Sanctum.

Moruru seems to have been reformed
by the great teachings of Sephrian Aer.
He should no longer cause any trouble.

Hear what the monks
have to say in Acedia.

Report to Moruru in Quattor Street
in Acedia.

Deliver the Platinum Music Box to
Maurcio at Goth Isut Port, Acedia.

Take Maurcio to see Moruru
in Quattor Street in Acedia.
■削除予定
Glory from the Past

You found a dead man clutching a
message describing a certain location.
What could be concealed there?

The dead man's diary led you to his
old friend, who spoke fondly of him
but declined to keep the treasure.

Go to the spot marked in the
Dead Man's Message that you found
at Fable Rock in Luxuria.

Meet the person mentioned in
the Salvager's Diary.
Partners

A Nopon historian has fallen off a ruin
after an argument with his partner.
Fumufumu now needs your rescue.

You rescued Fumufumu and reunited him
with Mylak. The two have resumed
their investigations and their bickering.

Rescue Fumufumu from somewhere
near the Tamie Pillars in Luxuria.

Go to Mylak at the Sealed
Quarry in Luxuria.
The Lost Turtle

You bumped into a young boy upset
at having lost a good-luck charm given
to him by his father. Help him find it.

You retrieved the charm from
the Graaz Pippito and gave it
back to Lucarion.

Look for the Carved Stone Turtle
by the Amphoret Pillar in Luxuria.

Look for the Carved Stone Turtle that
the Graaz Pippito took at Amphoret
Pillar in Luxuria.

Give the Carved Stone Turtle to
Lucarion by the Teos Aure Rear
Gate in Luxuria.
Cargo Escort

You've been asked by Isolde, from
Avaritia's Central Exchange, to guard
her precious cargo from Krabbles.

With the Krabbles gone, Isolde's trade
deal went off without a hitch. In future,
she plans to hire mercenary guards.

Head to Goldmund Return Port in
Avaritia and defend the cargo from
the Trent Krabble.

Defeat the additional Trent Krabbles
that appeared at Goldmund Return
Port in Avaritia.

Defeat the additional Trent Krabbles
and Petra Crustip that appeared at
Goldmund Return Port in Avaritia.

Report to Isolde at the
Central Exchange in Avaritia.
※削除
Buoy Can't Swim

By a lake in Gula, you met a young
boy who wants to learn to swim.
Collect some Buoyweed for him.

Thanks to the Buoyweed, Sulya learned
to swim in no time at all. He's often
seen splashing around with his friends.

Gather Buoyweed from
Coolley Lake in Gula.

Give the gathered Buoyweed to
Sulya by Coolley Lake in Gula.
Star-Crossed Lovers

A young couple heading to the shipyard
have been beset by monsters!
Defeat the monsters and help them out.

Riana and Norman have headed to
Superbia. Maybe you could pay them
a visit if you're ever in town yourself...

Riana has returned to Torigo with
Norman to persuade her parents.
A girl like her should have no trouble!

Save the young couple being
attacked by Grambl Tirkin at
Melnath's Shoulder in Gula.

Speak with Riana at
Melnath's Shoulder in Gula.
Gather Shepherd's Purses in Gula.
Gather Dawn Hydrangeas in Gula.

Visit the apothecary Nils
in Torigo in Gula
to fetch the medicine.

Go to meet Riana's parents in
the Grodd Residential Zone in Gula.

Collect the medicine from Nils
in Torigo in Gula.

Deliver the medicine to Riana at
Melnath's Shoulder in Gula.
Fresh and Fruity

Twaina has asked you to gather some
ingredients for her famous pie.
In the name of delicious pie, do it!

The stove repairs complete, Twaina has
made a delicious pie for her husband.
They seem to be as loved up as ever!
Pick some Hustle Hyacinth in Gula.
Catch some Mint Fish in Gula.

Deliver the pie ingredients to Twaina in
Gula's Grodd Residential Zone.

Ask Yoel in Gula's
Torigo Market to
fix Twaina's stove.

Pay the repair fees to Yoel in
Gula's Torigo Market, or
find a Chain of Keys for him.

Return to Twaina in Gula's
Grodd Residential Zone.
Cannadea's Troubles

A woman has asked you to deal with
monsters in the snow fields preventing
her from collecting medicinal herbs.

You cleared out the monsters, only
to find out that the "medicinal" herbs
were ingredients for a love potion...

Suppress the Idle Rodonya
in the Argan Iceblooms.
Report to Cannadea in Elmos Square.
Judicium's Legacy

Ismet has asked you to find the remains
of ancient weapons used in a great war
long ago. He intends to study them.

The weapons you found should help
Ismet with his research.

Find the Black Steel Circlers
in Temperantia.

Hand over the Black Steel Circlers
to Ismet at the Superbian Garrison,
Temperantia.
Souvenirs from Mors

A merchant would like you to look
for valuable rarities in the Cliffs of
Mors. If you find something like
that, bring it to her!

Shibushibu finally seems satisfied with the
variety of rare items you've found.

You did as Shibushibu and Tsubutsubu
requested. Let's hope Tsubutsubu
enjoys her Linka Honey bath.

Gather up items from around the Cliffs
of Mors and take them to Shibushibu
near the Cliffs of Mors Entry.

Gather up Linka Honey from around the
Cliffs of Mors and take it to Tsubutsubu
near the Cliffs of Mors Entry.

Talk to Shibushibu near the
Cliffs of Mors Entry.
Hard to Stomach

Overheard a story about stolen secret
docs which a monster then swallowed.
Find them and claim the reward.

You took the sensitive documents from
the Noog Skeeter and returned them to
Ilham. Superbia is now a little safer.

You took the sensitive documents from
the Noog Skeeter and returned them to
Ilham. Superbia is now a little safer.

Defeat the Noog Skeeter and get
the sensitive documents.

Report to Ilham at the entrance to
Hadashal Palace in Superbia.

Defeat the Noog Skeeter near the Great
Heat Extraction Duct in Superbia and
retrieve the sensitive documents.
スペルビアの料理

スペルビアの食堂のオーナーから
足りなくなってしまった食材の調達を
依頼された

集めた食材をオーナーに渡した
お礼として料理のレシピをもらった
海トカゲを倒し食材を入手しよう
中型ヘビを倒し食材を入手しよう
食材をオーナーに渡そう
グーラでカリカリソウを3個集めよう
インヴィディアでクロザクロを2個集めよう
食材をオーナーに渡そう
Ecological Survey

You found a flyer requesting help with
an ecological survey of fauna in the
Thermal Exhaust Fork. Check it out!

The palace guard Joblin was delighted
with what you brought him. His
research should be of use to the army.

Get Whitescale Antennae by defeating
Noog Vangs at the Thermal Exhaust
Fork in Superbia.

Deliver the Whitescale Antennae to
Joblin at Hadashal Palace, Superbia.
Maiden Voyage

You stumbled upon a Blade being
attacked by monsters. Come to her aid.

Olua was reunited with her Driver, Romney,
and their bond was strengthened by the
experience. Perhaps you will run into
them again one day?
Help the Blade under attack.
Check that the Blade isn't hurt.

Search for a boy named Romney
who fell into the Cloud Sea.
Let Olua know that Romney is fine.
At Wit's End

You encountered a fretful Nopon
overwhelmed by an enormous job he
took on but can't complete. Help him
gather the items he needs.

You took over Sekaka's job and
claimed the reward from his client
Jambhar. By all accounts, Sekaka was
in over his head...
Gather 14 Energy Aubergines.
Collect five Border Sapphires.
Find two Angel Engines.

Report that you have all the items to
Sekaka on Merto Island in Liberalitas.

Go and collect the reward from
Sekaka's client at the Cargo
Transportation Zone in Superbia.
Timeworn Machine

You found instructions displayed on an
old machine that was lying in the road.
Follow them and see what happens.

You followed the instructions and
got your reward. But the old machine
seems to be broken for good...

Defeat three Garasha Sovereign
on Highway 8.

Retrieve the goods found in
the Evacuation Center.
A Helping Hand

Julio has requested your help with the
Acedian refugee relief effort. Go to
each distribution center to lend a hand.

You finished helping each distribution
center. Let's hope that the refugees'
lives get easier and things settle down.

Lend a hand at the distribution center
in the Commercial District in Invidia.

Lend a hand at the distribution center
near Gwendle Repair Dock in Invidia.

Lend a hand at the distribution center
at Fons Maim Port in Invidia.

Report back to Julio in the
Commercial District in Invidia.
World Tree Disaster

A refugee boy told of a Nopon who
fell to the World Tree and has not been
seen since. Help search for him.

Aki's friend Bonono and a Nopon girl,
Alulu, were rescued from the World
Tree. They must be great friends.

Search for Bonono who is lost on the
World Tree.

Help Bonono who is surrounded by
Kyamel Sovereigns on the World Tree.

Talk to Bonono who you helped at the
World Tree.

Search for another lost Nopon on the
World Tree.

Help the Nopon taken by the
Skriim Sovereign on the World Tree.

Talk to the Nopon you rescued on the
World Tree.

Report to Aki in Port Anangham in
Superbia.
No-Penny Nopon

Poor Shatoto has been duped and left
penniless by some soldiers. Cheer him
up with some Noodle Soup!

After sampling Ruska Noodle Soup,
Shatoto headed home and will return
with his mother for another bowl.

Develop Gula, then complete the
Merc Mission "Turf War Protection"
and obtain Ahato's Noodle Soup.

Give the Ruska Noodle Soup to Shatoto
in Galad Residential Zone in Gula.
Diplomatic Tensions

Resolve the dispute that has sprung
up between the people of Torigo
and the Superbian Army.

Gimu and the others agreed to rein in
their anger. It's a complex issue that
will hopefully be resolved bit by bit.

Get Gimu and the others
outside of Torigo Relay Base
in Gula to calm down.

Persuade Gimu and the others
outside of Torigo Relay Base.
A Small War

Salvage another Morph Orb to replace
the Gulan youth's memento which
has been stolen by an Superbian youth.

Pero and Karze, and their families,
have made peace. Now they even get
together for meals sometimes.

Do some salvaging at Torigo Relay
Base in Gula and get a Morph Orb.

Give the Morph Orb to Pero in
Tretl Windmill Plaza in Gula.
The Missing Order

The order from Nopon trader,
Mopopo, is past due. Go to the Nopon
Camp and check on Mopopo.

Without Morph's extra tariffs, Mopopo
decided to stop delivering goods. Rex
and co. brought Hula her stuff instead.

Go to the Nopon Camp in
Garanti Plain in Gula
to check on Mopopo.

Deliver the goods to Hula in
Grodd Residential Zone in Gula
and explain the situation.

スペルビア高台の兵士を倒そう
※水面下でタスク進行
Repair Torigo's Crane

Gather the parts that Mache needs
to repair the crane that keeps getting
broken by someone.

The parts were used to fix the crane.
Thanks to the repairs its even stronger
than before.
Gather Winding Gears in Gula.

Give the Winding Gears to Mache
at Saets Lumber Co. in Gula.
Crane Criminals

Sniff out the criminals who broke the
crane in Torigo. Start by asking
around town.

Prank-loving Tirkin were to blame for
breaking the crane! They're now
working for the city to make up for it.

Obtain information on the arrival
of the criminals who broke the
crane in Torigo in Gula.

Obtain information on the appearance
of the criminals who broke the
crane in Torigo in Gula.

Obtain information on the location
of the criminals who broke the
crane in Torigo in Gula.

Two Tirkin-like shadows have been
spotted in a giant tree close to
Torigo. Head over and check it out.

At nighttime, defeat the Infallible Tirkin
and the Resourceful Tirkin at the giant
tree close to Torigo.

Report back to Pettle at Saets Lumber
Co. in Gula with what you've
learned about the culprits.
Tirkin Suppression

An Superbian soldier needs your
help to get rid of some vicious
Tirkin that trouble the public.

After defeating some Tirkin and telling
the soldier their strength, he expects to
stand a better chance against them.

Defeat three Revenge Tirkin in the
Tirkin Turf in Gula.

Report to Saclich at
Torigo Relay Base, Gula.
Language Teacher

You've been asked to find someone to
teach reading and writing.
See if you can find a suitable candidate.

You found a promising teacher to invite
to Iyasaki. The kids will surely benefit
from learning reading and writing skills!

Find a reading and writing teacher
somewhere in Alst.
Science Teacher

You've been asked to find someone to
teach mathematics and science.
See if you can find a suitable candidate.

You found a promising teacher to invite
to Iyasaki. Now the children can learn
to understand the world around them!

Find a math and science teacher in
one of Alst's regions and recruit
them.

Speak with Smaia at the Canyon of
Husks, Spirit Crucible Elpys.

Collect a Colla Carrot from
Subterranean Lake Galantia
in Spirit Crucible Elpys.

Report back to Smaia at the
Canyon of Husks, Spirit Crucible
Elpys.
History Teacher

You've been asked to find
someone to teach history.
See if you can find a suitable candidate.

You found a promising teacher to invite
to Iyasaki. Learning about the past will
help the children build a better future!

Find a history teacher in one of
Alst's regions and recruit them.
Salvage the Ancient Salvaging Suit.

Report back to Toatoa at Bower
Lounge, Avaritia.
ターキンCを呼び戻す

ターキンCはカオスダケを
欲しがっている

ターキンCはエルピス霊洞入り口まで
戻っていった
カオスダケを見つけよう
ターキンCにトーク
ターキンDを呼び戻す

ターキンDは多数のエネミーに
襲われそうだ

ターキンDはエルピス霊洞入り口まで
戻っていった
ターキンDを襲っているエネミーを倒そう
ターキンDにトーク
ヴィルシュバ傭兵団A
ヴィルトシュバイン傭兵団のミニクエA

ヴィルトシュバイン傭兵団のミニクエA
をクリアしました
イグーナを10体倒そう
依頼人に報告
ヴィルシュバ傭兵団B
ヴィルトシュバイン傭兵団のミニクエB

ヴィルトシュバイン傭兵団のミニクエB
をクリアしました
A:シャボンサンゴを3個集めよう
B:ナナイロナマコを3個集めよう
依頼人に報告
ヴィルシュバ傭兵団C
ヴィルトシュバイン傭兵団のミニクエC

ヴィルトシュバイン傭兵団のミニクエC
をクリアしました
A:グレン鉱石を5個集めよう
B:セイラン鉱石を5個集めよう
依頼人に報告
Shiki's Password

Get information from the Merc Group
as a first step to looking for clues that
will aid in deciphering the tablet.

With the information that we got from
the Merc Group, we found out about
the ancient text and the password.

Send Shiki on a Merc Mission
to further find password clues.

Avaritia･Goldmund Warehouseに
Shikiの様子を見に行こう

Get information about the password
from Rogirogi at Fons Maim in Invidia.

Have Rododo show you his ancient text
to get information about the password
near Goldmund Flight Deck, Avaritia.

Get information about the password
from Arecilion in front of the
Library Philosofia in Luxuria.

Avaritia･Goldmund Warehouseにある
石版にパスワードを入力しよう
Unspoken Suspicion

A shady merc demands you return
classified documents you know nothing
about. You'll have to fight him off.

You've beaten the mercs and chased
them off. They did keep insisting Hotaru
has the documents, though...

At Invidia's Gwenith Paddies, defeat
Angry Durro and his lackey.
Kubira's Past: Liberalitas

An old book you got in Avaritia says
something about an island kingdom...
Go and investigate it!

There was no trace of any kingdom
on the island mentioned in the book.
It must not be related to Kubira.

Head to the Isle of Sleeping Remains in
Liberalitas.

Mine on Isle of Sleeping Remains in
Liberalitas.
Kubira's Past: Gula

According to a book from an Superbian
shop, Gula was once a republic.
Go and see what you can find out.

The Gulan chief claims that no kings
like Kubira existed in the old republic.
Looks like this isn't related either.

本の内容にあった
トリゴの街に向かおう

Talk to Edgar at the Saets Chief's
Residence in Gula.
Kubira's Past: Luxuria

A tablet in a Luxurian bookshop
claims there once were houses on the
drifts in Luxuria. Check it out!

Looking at the restored tablet, it's
clear that the previous Luxurian town
was on the drifts. No use to Kubira...

Excavate stone tablet fragments in the
Genbu Drifts area in Luxuria.
石版のかけらBを入手しよう
石版のかけらCを入手しよう

Return to the front of Biblio Paulio in
Luxuria and assemble the tablet's
fragments.
Kubira's Past: Folktales

A book bought from a shop in Invidia
mentions an ancient kingdom that was
near Temperantia. Go find out more!

Tales of Rigideria's fall are written on
the salvaged relics. Maybe this is
Kubira's kingdom.

Head to Dalnes Stone in Blackday
Peninsula, Temperantia.

Investigate Dalnes Stone in
Temperantia.

Get evidence of a small kingdom by
salvaging in Temperantia.
Boys and Bullies

A young boy has asked you to get back
his treasure from the bully who took it.
Grant his request.

You've brought Jamin's treasure
back to him from Janiki the bully.
Jamin seems really happy.

Find Janiki somewhere near
Loska's Gap in Invidia.

Return Jamin's Mud Balls to Jamin
by Sevind Palace Plaza in Invidia.
Family vs. Fiends

Some ruffian is trying to steal
rations from a mother and child.
Lend the unfortunate victims a hand.

You took care of the mercenary and
saved Maryn and Terry. They both
seem very grateful for your help.

Defeat the Torst Driver
in Torika Alley, Invidia.
Speak to Terry in Torika Alley, Invidia.
Jeline and Shaun

Jeline asked you to search for Shaun.
Look for him outside of Fons Maim.

Shaun has been safely brought back!
Next time, let's show the couple how to
make the cookies you gave them!

Search for Shaun
in Land of the Beaten in Invidia.

Report back to Jeline in the
Invidia Merc Barracks.
ナビのテスト
ナビのテスト
グーラ街の宝箱からアイテム入手
